name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Headphones
description: The Sony WH-1000XM5 headphones offer industry-leading noise cancellation and exceptional sound quality. With up to 30 hours of battery life, they are perfect for long trips and daily commutes.

name: Apple MacBook Air M2
description: The redesigned MacBook Air with M2 chip is strikingly thin and fast. It features a stunning Liquid Retina display and 18 hours of battery life.

name: Nike Air Force 1 '07
description: The radiance lives on in the Nike Air Force 1 '07, the basketball original that puts a fresh spin on what you know best: durably stitched overlays and clean finishes.

name: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra
description: Meet the Galaxy S23 Ultra. Details pop with a 200MP camera. Power through the day with the fastest Snapdragon processor ever in a Galaxy.

name: Herman Miller Aeron Chair
description: The Aeron Chair fits all the ways you sit. It provides optimal support and comfort with its Pellicle suspension material and PostureFit SL back support.

name: PlayStation 5 Console
description: Experience lightning fast loading with an ultra-high speed SSD, deeper immersion with support for haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and 3D Audio.

name: Canon EOS R6 Mark II
description: Capture the perfect moment with the Canon EOS R6 Mark II. High-speed continuous shooting, advanced subject tracking, and 4K video capabilities.

name: Levi's 501 Original Fit Jeans
description: The original blue jean. Our signature straight fit is an all-American style standard that pairs with everything.

name: Dyson V15 Detect Vacuum
description: The most powerful, intelligent cordless vacuum. Laser reveals microscopic dust. Successfully captures 99.99% of particles.

name: Nintendo Switch OLED Model
description: Play at home or on-the-go with a vibrant 7-inch OLED screen. The Nintendo Switch OLED Model features enhanced audio and a wide adjustable stand.
